| icon           = poe2 pet_flame_naga icon.png
| description    = This tiny nāga watches you with intent yellow eyes. During moments of rest, it curls about your ankle like a sleepy vine and licks the salt sweat from your armor.

While the Flame Nāga Hatchling is following you around you gain bonus Burn armor and everyone in your party gains bonus accuracy with Fire attacks.
